EmailTemplate.name: Ryan Medical Acquisition (1562334964.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Ryan Medical Acquisition (1562334964.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Sherry,
I wanted to take this time to congratulate CHS on their acquisition of Ryan Medical Distributors Inc. This puts CHS in a great position for further growth in 2019 and beyond.
Grand & Toy can help the entire organization with managing their indirect spends during this exciting time, where you will need a partner who understands your needs.
We have spoken in the past about a potential partnership and I'd like to facilitate an in person meeting to discuss what that could look like.
Are you available the week of July 15th? Please let me know if a partnership with us is still a viable option for CHS to explore.
Grand & Toy is expanding our offering & capabilities (below a link for context), we are more than just a products company!
https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/service-solutions.aspx <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/service-solutions.aspx]]>
Best regards,
Liz Rust Business Development Manager, Central Canada 200 Aviva Park Dr, Vaughan, ON L4L 9C7 E-mail: elizabethrust@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:elizabethrust@grandandtoy.com]]> | Cell: 365-778-8250 Office Supplies | Interiors & Furniture | Print & Documents | Facility Resources | Technology
grandandtoy.com <[[http://grandandtoy.com/]]> business.grandandtoy.com <[[http://business.grandandtoy.com/]]>
